body_html:
I wasn't able to build for cuda 9 + cudnn 7 out of the box (c8f824c)

Installing nccl-dev package from the latest nvidia nccl2 deb doesn't work.

The only way I got the build going was to grab the latest nccl1 (deprecated) from github that includes the cuda 9 half fix, and copy that overtop of the nccl folder in the pytorch source tree.

I wasn't able to build for cuda 9 + cudnn 7 out of the box (c8f824cd)

Installing nccl-dev package from the latest nvidia nccl2 deb doesn't work.

The only way I got the build going was to grab the latest nccl1 (deprecated) from github that includes the cuda 9 half fix, and copy that overtop of the nccl folder in the pytorch source tree.
